author: rickhall
msg: Major refactoring of module layer. Removed IModuleDefition and IContentLoader,
merged functionality into IModule/ModuleImpl. Removed IModuleFactory. Removed
ISearchPolicy merged functionality into ContentClassLoader, now called
ModuleClassLoader. Merged BundleInfo with BundleImpl, Felix now extends
BundleImpl. Still needs much more clean up. (FELIX-851)

author: mfreedman
msg: Initial changes to run on JSF2.0

author: dhruba
msg: HIVE-203. Fix eclipse templates to get junit tests to run.

author: dblevins
msg: OPENEJB-986: Stateful Remove exception handling regression
Stateful beans should not be removable while in a transaction (regression is that it was enforced for BMT but not CMT)
